mapper.select: select a.device_code, a.id, b.id as device_id, b.name as device_name, dt.name as device_type_name, dt.code as device_type_code, b.line_code, cl.line_name, cs.station_code, cs.station_name, a.fault_code, csp.position_code, csp.position_name from fault_device a LEFT JOIN device b ON a.device_code = b.code LEFT JOIN device_type dt on b.device_type_code = dt.code LEFT JOIN cs_line cl on b.line_code = cl.line_code LEFT JOIN cs_station cs on b.station_code = cs.station_code LEFT JOIN cs_station_position csp on csp.position_code = b.position_code where a.fault_code = #{faultCode} AND cl.del_flag =0 and cs.del_flag =0 AND b.del_flag =0

select su.username from cs_user_depart cud left join sys_user su on su.id = cud.user_id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.user_id = su.id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = sur.role_id WHERE sr.role_code = 'foreman' AND su.org_id in ( select org_id from sys_user where username = #{receiveUserName} ) GROUP BY su.id
select su.username from sys_user su left join sys_user_role sur on sur.user_id = su.id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = sur.role_id where sr.role_name = '送修经办人' limit 1
